title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Science Learning Motivation Profile Design Based on Self-Determination Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific fields and general understanding of learning motivation theories
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of the three psychological needs of self-determination (autonomy, competence, and relatedness) on science learning.
Learners develop the ability to strategically select and apply SDL (Self-Directed Learning) and TDI (Teacher-Directed Instruction) approaches based on situational contexts.
Learners can diagnose their motivation profiles (5 types) in mobile environments and suggest improvement directions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
